attributes.action: Publish transparent accounts to show if "Green Taxes" are actually spent on the Environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tax burden upon the (ever decreasing) number of tax payers in the UK, continues to increase almost daily. We are now to pay more and more "Green Taxes" with no assurance as to where the money is spent.
Look at the road tax as an example, with over 80% of the monies raised not being invested in alternative methods of transport.
I deeply distrust this and any other government with any further taxes which will inevitably be forced upon us.
It is time that governments are made accountable to the electorate by having independently auditted accounts to show where and how taxes are spent.
They should then be held to account by the courts.
I am in total agreement that we need to be more environmentally aware, but regarding the relentless unaccountable taxes..
Enough is Enough !!
